snippet: Lydia Ko putted on one green and played six holes before ending a long Friday in the same place she started: with a share of the lead in the Coates Golf Championship in Ocala, Fla.
abstract: Golf Roundup; James Hahn takes first-round lead at Phoenix Open golf tournament; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko putted on one green and played six holes before ending a long Friday in the same place she started: with a share of the lead in the Coates Golf Championship in Ocala, Fla.

headline.main: Amid Rain Delays and a Long Day, Lydia Ko Shares the Lead
headline.print_headline: Hahn Leads the Phoenix Open After a Bogey-Free Round
